translations.translation: An error occurred on retrieving the snapshots.
The snapshot frequency modification will take effect shortly.
An error occurred when updating the snapshot intervals.
A snapshot is an instantaneous capture of the status of your NAS-HA, at the precise moment that the snapashot is taken.
Snapshots use up space on your partition in order to function properly. No snapshot history is saved: for snapshots of the same frequency, the last snapshot taken will overwrite the previous one.
